results.name: Continued fraction for sqrt(600).
link: Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 1).
formula: a(n)=25+23*(-1)^n-24*[C(2*n,n) mod 2], with n>=0 [From _Paolo P. Lava_, May 15 2009]
mathematica: Block[{$MaxExtraPrecision=1000}, ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[600],120]] (* or *) PadRight[{24},120,{48,2}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 24 2018 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
